TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LiteralControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class LiteralControl Inherits Control Implements ITextControl
public ref class LiteralControl : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::ITextControl

summary.span: 表示 HTML 元素、文本和 ASP.NET 页中不需要在服务器上处理的其他任何字符串。

span.span: Represents HTML elements, text, and any other strings in an ASP.NET page that do not require processing on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 编译所有 HTML 元素和不需要到此类的实例的服务器端处理的可读文本。ASP.NET compiles all HTML elements and readable text that do not require server-side processing into instances of this class. 例如，不包含的 HTML 元素`runat="server"`其开始标记中的属性/值对将编译为对象。For example, an HTML element that does not contain a `runat="server"` attribute/value pair in its opening tag is compiled into a object. 对象后不维护视图状态，因此的内容对象必须在每个请求重新创建。 objects do not maintain view state, so the contents of a object must be recreated on each request. 文本控件的行为作为文本持有人，这意味着，你可以从文本控件中提取文本，并从父服务器控件的删除文本控件收集到父级的属性。Literal controls behave as text holders, meaning that you can extract text from the literal control and remove the literal control from the parent server control's collection through the parent's property. 因此，当开发自定义控件派生自类中，请确保您的控件执行任何所需本身，而不使用调用预处理步骤方法来完成这些操作。Therefore, when you develop a custom control derived from the class, make sure your control performs any required preprocessing steps itself, rather than using a call to the method to accomplish them. 通常情况下，你可以执行此操作来提高 Web 应用程序的响应时间。Typically, you would do this to improve the response time of your Web application. 你可以添加或删除从使用以编程方式将页或服务器控件的文本控件或方法，分别。You can add or remove literal controls from a page or server control programmatically using the or the method, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用重载构造函数时重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the overloaded constructor when overriding the method. 该代码将添加两个新对象和一个Web 服务器控件到当前服务器控件的属性。The code adds two new objects and a Web server control to the current server control's property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/CS/controlcreatechildcontrols.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/VB/controlcreatechildcontrols.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类包含要在请求的 ASP.NET 页上呈现的文本字符串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains a literal string to be rendered on the requested ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个类， `CustLiteralControlClass`，扩展类。The following code example creates a class, `CustLiteralControlClass`, that extends the class. 它将创建名为的类实例`myLiteralControlClass1`使用构造函数没有指定的文本对象。It creates an instance of the class named `myLiteralControlClass1` by using the constructor that does not specify the text of the object. 在创建对象后，属性用于设置它所包含的文本。After the object is created, the property is used to set the text that it contains. [!code-csharp[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/CS/customliteralcontrol.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/VB/customliteralcontrol.vb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 用指定的文本初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified text.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个实例类使用构造函数。The following code example creates two instances of the class using the constructor. 两个实例呈现 H3 HTML 元素，开始和结束标记，并且包括要显示在 H3 标记内的文本。The two instances render opening and closing tags for an H3 HTML element, and include the text to display within the H3 tags. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/CS/controlcreatechildcontrols.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/VB/controlcreatechildcontrols.vb#1)]

summary.span: 为 类的当前实例创建 对象。

span.span: Creates an object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，对象包含文本和任何子服务器控件。By default, objects contain only text and no child server controls. 如果你想要更改此行为，必须重写此方法。If you want to change this behavior, you must override this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例替代方法创建的实例类而不是实例类。The following code example overrides the method to create an instance of the class rather than an instance of the class. summary.span: 将 对象的内容写入 ASP.NET 页。

span.span: Writes the content of the object to the ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果创建自定义服务器控件和想要将特定的 HTML 或文本呈现给客户端时，可以通过传递的值来提高性能的控件属性方法，而不是调用方法。When you create a custom server control and want to render specific HTML or text to a client, you can improve the performance of the control by passing the value of the property to the method rather than calling the method.
